name: gooey

effect.sun_moon: Lowers attacking Pokémon's Speed by one stage on contact.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Lowers attacking Pokémon's Speed by one stage on contact.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Lowers attacking Pokémon's Speed by one stage on contact.

short_effect: Lowers attacking Pokémon's Speed by one stage on contact.

flavor_text.sun_moon: Contact with the Pokémon lowers the attacker’s Speed stat.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Contact with the Pokémon lowers the attacker’s Speed stat.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Contact with the Pokémon lowers the attacker’s Speed stat.
